title: Ram sold a cow to rohim at 20% profit. Rahim sold it to Robert at 25% profit. If Robert paid 900, then at what price Ram had purchased the cow? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assume that Ram purchased the cow at the price of x rs Rahim purchased it in 120x /100 =6x/5 rs Robert purchased it in 6x/5 × 125/100 =3x/2 rs According to the question, 3x/2= 900 So, x= 600 So, Ram purchased the cow at the price of 600 rs
125 % = 900 100% = 720 = what Rahim paid 120% = 720 100% = Rs 600 = is the price what Ram purchased ANSWER
